noPermission.description_embed: You do not have permission to use this command!
noPermission.description_embed_no_features: The function is currently disabled. An administrator needs to enable it for it to be usable.

addCommand.description_embed: You have successfully set the role {0} in the Auto Role list to be assigned upon a new user's entry.
addCommand.description_embed_delete: The role {0} has been successfully removed from the Auto Role list and will no longer be set upon a new user's entry.
addCommand.description_embed_missingpermissions: The role you are trying to set/remove is above the role {0}, which belongs to Alka. To set/remove it from the list, move Alka's role above the role you want to set.

listCommand.description_embed: {0} Here is the list of Auto Roles currently set to be assigned to new users in the server.
listCommand.no_role: No roles set yet, set them with /autorole.
